name: King Princess
description:
Hey, look, we found a modern-day Jewish king!

At the same time, we found a modern-day Jewish princess!

And they are the one and the same person! Confused much?

Rising recording start Mikaela Straus is, in fact, Jewish. One of her great-greatparents was former US Congressman Isidor Strauss, who owned Macy's and perished on the Titanic. She is also a king... and a princess, but not the hereditary kind. (Unless you consider the elder Straus New York Jewish royalty, but that's REALLY stretching it.)

To her fans, Straus is known as King Princess. For those curious, Mikaela is genderqueer, so she picked a name that encompasses both her sides. Sometimes she is a king, sometimes she is a princess. Makes sense?

Nothing good has ever come from arguing with a king... or a princess.
cons: To her fans, Straus is known as King Princess. For those curious, Mikaela is genderqueer, so she picked a name that encompasses both her sides. Sometimes she is a king, sometimes she is a princess. Makes sense?
